const SEO = ({ description, lang, meta, title }) => {
  const { site } = useStaticQuery(

    <Helmet
      htmlAttributes={{
        lang,
      }}
      title={title}
      titleTemplate={defaultTitle ? `%s | ${defaultTitle}` : null}
      meta={[
        {
          name: `description`,
          content: metaDescription,
        },
        {
          property: `og:title`,
          content: title,
        },
        {
          property: `og:description`,

        {
          name: `twitter:title`,

        {

  );
};
